title: Spicy Thai Chili Mango Sauce
directions: it reminded me of getting yelled at in the back of some dingy prep kitchen, a very long time ago.
ingredients: Spicy Thai Chili Mango Sauce Ingredients: (note everything in this is "to taste")
1/2 small Thai chili, minced very fine
1 teaspoon sambal chili sauce, or other similar chili paste
